items.name: wake
snippet: // The actual wakeup call is delegated through a virtual function call
// to the implementation which is defined by the executor.
// Don't call `drop` -- the waker will be consumed by `wake`.
// SAFETY: This is safe because `Waker::from_raw` is the only way
// to initialize `wake` and `data` requiring the user to acknowledge
// that the contract of `RawWaker` is upheld.

items.name: will_wake
snippet: // We optimize this by comparing vtable addresses instead of vtable contents.
// This is permitted since the function is documented as best-effort.
let RawWaker { data: a_data, vtable: a_vtable } = self.waker;
let RawWaker { data: b_data, vtable: b_vtable } = other.waker;
